website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically for high traffic areas, this doormat is easy to maintain, environmentally friendly and mildew/moisture-resistant. Good for heavy outdoor use.
pros: Can contain over a pound of dirt
Plastic bristles easily remove dirt from shoes, boots, and pet paws
cons: Plastic bristles create unpleasant crackling noise

customer_reviews.title: Door mat literally melted in the sun
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 of these door mats. One was in direct sun (for less than 2 days) and it literally melted. Door mats should be made to withstand outdoor temperatures and sun. These are bad quality door mats.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Beretta

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to clean by giving them a shake or hosing ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat is ideal for entry doors where you know you'll need something that will get between the crevasses of shoe soles to clean out mud and dirt. These are easy to clean by giving them a shake or hosing them down.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe cleaners!
customer_reviews.text: I like these but I have them inside the house just inside the door. They are made for the outside but I am afraid they will get stolen and they are definitely too nice and not cheap enough for me to risk that. I haven't tested them out in heavy rain or snow as we are still in the summer, but they are working pretty well so far in collecting sand and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfberry

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida where sand is everywhere and with that sand come sand spurs, small round thorns that stick to everything. We walk our dogs everyday and needed to make sure we didn't track any of these thorns into our house where our newly crawling baby girl might encounter one. It's rough enough to wipe our shoes on and keeps what was wiped embedded within its thread. A quick shake and beating of it loosens the trapped debris easily and it's ready to use again.
customer_reviews.author: ramos_1099

customer_reviews.title: Cracking after less of a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat itself, it cleans boots etc, but the bottom and the edge started cracking after not even a month outside. I was going to buy another one for the other door, but I doubt I will do so now. Standard use, little traffic on it.
customer_reviews.author: G.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat - would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for cleaning off shoes. What especially like is the very neutral color which blends well into the cement but more that it is comfortable on bare feet as I'm alway walking onto my back patio barefooted and so many mats are too rough for that. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Best doormat for cleaning your footwear!
customer_reviews.text: I'll always remember my neighbors sign at the front door, "If you're not Kenny Rogers or God, take off your boots!" That just doesn't happen at our house. Boots and shoes go out, then they come back in, carrying enough acreage and fertilizer to start an indoor garden. We live on a farm. With livestock. After a rain, there's no telling what's hitchin' a ride on those boots. These "tuff grass" door mats take off over 90% of the stuff bogging your boots down. Other door mats just look cute. These work! As the one whose duties also involve cleaning the house, I highly recommend these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Rex Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Doormat
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, really cleans sand, dirt, and grass from shoes. Easy to clean. I just bump it against the side of my house and most of the debris fally out. Then I use a hose to rinse the remainder out. Keeps my house much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: ladybutterfly102

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Mat - But Not Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This mat is ok. It's fairly effective at getting the dirt of your shoes. Not great, but does a decent enough job. My biggest complaint is the mat doesn't have and type of gripping on the back to keep it in place. This mat will work if you're looking for something inexpensive to use in a garage or backdoor. I don't recommend for your entrance. Find something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan1117

customer_reviews.title: Warm climes only?
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine and works fine in the summer. But then came winter in Minnesota. Lifted it to knock off the snow when cleaning the front stoop and it fell apart. Follow-up on 4/30/2018: contacted GrassWorxllc.com when I learned they have a one-yr warranty on their products. They were very prompt and nice about replacing the damaged mat. I uprated my rating from two stars to three because of this. I still wonder how the mat will fare over time in our cold weather in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does an excellent job of cleaning dirt off shoes. Is fairly heavy so it doesn't blow away in Oklahoma winds. Is 100% synthetic so it doesn't hold water. It drains and dries quickly. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but already ripped down the middle after 1 month of easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Desmo

customer_reviews.title: Best Doormat for Cleaning your Shoes
customer_reviews.text: We use it at the entrancesto the house and the RV. It really gets the mud and other dirt off your shoes before you come in. We've had several of these and they don't hold up that well. They start to tear and I have to fix them with duct tape until they fall apart. It's the backing that seems to give way. This would be good for a tackroom or mudroom. When it gets dirty, you just shake it or hit it gently against a column and the dirt comes tumbling out.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Dan

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these and love them and got my first one several years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these and love them and got my first one several years ago, and still holding up great. They're the best at keeping debris out of the house. I hate the common straw like ones you can buy everywhere. They always seem to track in their own straw particles. Never have that issue with this mat. Also scrapes the stuff off your shoes really well. If it gets too dusty/dirty, just spray it down with the hose. So easy to keep it nice and clean!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Very good doormat. And much better than the picture makes it look. Initially, I was concerned, had seen one at a neighbor's house, thought it looked a little flimsy. NOOOO! The base of this is actually appropriately rigid, but a little flexible, so you can hold it upside down, shake it out, knock on the bottom/back of it to get all the debris out. And it is some kind of resin base, so highly weather resistant. The plastic "grass" is very toothy, holds up high, gets all into the sole of the shoe, does a solid job of removing debris before stepping indoors. Good product; definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for getting dog poop off your shoes
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered this mat because it's so common around where I live to accidentally step in dog poop. It does a good job of scrubbing the soles of my shoes; some of the harder-to-reach areas don't get cleaned so well, but I bought a separate brush for that. It takes a good amount of wiping to clean my shoes, but it does the job. I wouldn't call this mat sturdy; it's very lightweight and I have to hold it in place with one foot while I wipe the other. I'm happy with it, but I doubt I'll be buying another one when it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Pointillism 101

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd carpet from this company and a great product. I use one at my back door and one in my camper. Removes light dirt like a big scrub brush. They are all plastic with high "pile" so they are easy to shake out or hose down; and they are waterproof. The "pile" does permanently bend some under foot pressure after a while, which would be expected, but still cleans shoes well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: stiff presumably plastic strands which do a great job of cleaning shoes when we wipe our feet ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat is made of tall, stiff presumably plastic strands which do a great job of cleaning shoes when we wipe our feet on it. The strands hold up well; we've been using this matt for a couple months now and it looks pretty much like when it was new. Unlike the material that many other matts are made of, this one does not absorb water, making it easier to keep clean and to clean- a quick shake out or hose down removes the debris accumulated in matt. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey S.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after light usage in RV
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat 8 months ago and store it in a compartment in our RV. Out of the 8 months, we've used it for a total of 6 weeks. This week, while "slapping" the mat against the table to dislodge dirt and pine needles (a real challenge!), the mat tore in several places! The underside rubber is also sloughing off. So, I can't recommend this mat over anything else, and sill be searching for another brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: great quality grass-type mats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for each of my exterior doors. They have held up extremely well and manage to keep a lot of dirt out of my house. They are a little work to clean unless you're young and strong---I've only cleaned them twice in a couple of years, so they trap, hold, & hide a lot of dirt. They do not curl up on the edges. I am very pleased with them & recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SamEE

customer_reviews.title: You have kids? You need this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING doormat. I put this doormat in the inside of my house and my kids run in and out the house and this collects so much dirt. When i first bought this I thought that it was just a simple doormat but didnt realize it accumulates all dirt until i turned this mat around and all the dirt came out into the floor so I had to sweep it all up. Its fantastic and you dont even need to rub off your shoes on the mat. I have no idea how it does it but thank god i bought this.
customer_reviews.author: RoseS

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot in sun!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for my deck to prevent tracking in grass and it does a good job of cleaning your shoes, however it gets so hot in the sun you can burn your feet. You cannot walk on this with bare feet nor should you let pets walk across it. Not worth returning. Also it arrived in a huge box six feet long and four feet wide.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, catches lots of dirt, cleans bottom of dirty shoes pretty well and they've held up a long time (unlike the larger size). I just wish they would allow the area underneath to stay dry or dry out after it gets wet. Im always having to move them off the deck when it rains because water gets trapped under it and started rotting the wooden boards. Just keep that in mind when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I live on a farm in florida. The mat is used for my front door. My girlfriend and I abused this thing every day for half a year so far! It sits it direct sunlight ALL day. It is working as intended just fine. Nothing has fallen out. It has not eroded into oblivion. You do have to clean it if you don't want lots of dirt in it...or other unmentionable things. You obviously shouldn't dropkick this thing although I'm sure you could. Get one. It is worth not having to clean inside the house so often.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely and doesn't look dirty with time
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Other mats for the door seem to look really dirty with time. I have had these for several months in an area kinda country and I have to sweep regularly. These always look clean.. well as clean as a door mat can look. They also function very well for removing debris before coming in the house. I have all hardwood so it is important for me that these are functional and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. We put it on the outside step of our Jumping Jack trailer tent to trap grass and dirt on shoes. It's amazing how much this pulls off a shoe if you wipe it even a little. Our kids are too young to really understand "wiping your feet" in the first place, but it still traps 95% of what they used to track in.
customer_reviews.author: C. RobinsonTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Small, doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, one for my patio door and one for my garage door. They’re a small, light weight mat, nothing about this screams quality. It does not stay put by my door, always moving around. I recently replaced the outdoor one with something higher quality. The only thing I found good about the mat was that the color didn’t fade.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Best door mat for actually cleaning your shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these -- one for my front door and one for the back patio. We live in an agricultural area and the dirt from the fields blows in from every direction. These mats really help keep the dirt and dust outside. I have had enough of those woven grass and jute doormats that do not capture dirt and fall apart after a few changes in seasons. These babies really do a great job of brushing all the loose dirt off one's shoes and trapping it, as well as trapping any debris blowing adjacent to the door. And they look nice and neat. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coburn-SchillTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Oh my! It’s as good as the claims say!
customer_reviews.text: Sand lives all around my home! It gets tracked in by the pound! I couldn’t walk barefoot on my wood floors...yuck! Between my dogs and the humans who enter, it became so bad I was almost wanting to move! I would HAVE to vacuum and sweep everyday!! Ain’t nobody got time for that! After purchasing one for each door to enter my home, the only thing I’m vacuuming up is pet hair and hair from my head and I only need to do it weekly!! Absolutely the best mat invented! Don’t hesitate if you have sand and dirt tracking problems!
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the garage to keep all dirt, etc. from coming into the house. It does a great job! I just flip it over to get the dirt out of it and sweep the residue up and put it right back down to collect more dirt,etc. It has helped to keep the dirt and other stuff from getting into the house. There is still dirt coming in but not one rug can make that stop happening. I would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teres

customer_reviews.title: Holds water
customer_reviews.text: I put this mat outside my front door. It rained the first night. The next morning when I stepped on it, my feet were soaked. It holds all the water and was difficult to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like these mats, but they aren't perfect. One of the three that I bought warped after being in full sun for half of the day since July. so instead of laying flat, the edge is wavy. If it gets any worse, I won't be able to leave it at the door, as someone might well trip over it. Also, one that is in a place that gets some moisture, stays wet underneath because (unlike the warped one) it is very smooth on the bottom and has no way for any air to circulate under it. Not a flaw with the product, but information that might come in handy for some buyers.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Bealessio

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch - NOT the same matt as on the video.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! The video is not of this matt! The video describes a more decorative matt that holds up to 5 lbs of dirt, this one holds (apparently) only 1 lb of dirt. I have not used it yet, so I will have to update this, but feels like a bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third floor mat, this is longer than the other two because I wanted to run it all across my kitchen floor to include sink and food preparation area! I have an iRobot and have never had a problem with it vacuuming the other two, but this one seems to have uneven areas on the edge so now the coating is gone in those areas! All that being said I really like them as I am on my feet a lot in my quilting room where the other two are!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Works great outside our RV door
customer_reviews.text: The reason I didn't give these mats a 5-star is because they don't have holes in the bottom for water to drain through. They're soft enough that they don't hurt your bare feet and strong enough to get the dirt off your shoes. The problem with water not draining through is that if it rains, they stay wet until you lift them up to drain them.
customer_reviews.author: JRBW

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain on a good-looking mat
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a good mat. I like the "astro turf" even though it's not like any Astroturf I've ever been on. It's stiff and will do a good job scraping shoes, boots, or Crocs. I'm not a fan of the vinyl backing because once water gets under it, it's got nowhere to go, so after a rain, if you've got it on a deck, you might want to pick up the mat and let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gillette

customer_reviews.title: I had a dream
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use in beach house to control renters (and our own) sandy feet into house. This job it does well with sufficient wiping. But the feel on bare feet not very enjoyable and it gets pretty warm on south west facing entrance. If you are looking for cleaning shoes/boots should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: kurtisv

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mat!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well on getting dirt and grass off of shoes and lightweight to pick up and shake clean. But since the dirt doesn't accumulate on top, I don't feel like I need to shake it as often. Glad we discovered these! Have one outside back door and one at door from the garage. They are holding together well for us.
customer_reviews.author: debinindiana

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for my backyard full of tiny rocks. My dogs loved to kick them while running inside and this had definitely helped. Doesn’t work as great for plant life. Little dried flowers get inside but I’m glad it’s not rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Gives you CLEAN shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great! We have so much trouble in the winter in Colorado tracking in the ice melt crystals. These mats make quick work of cleaning off our shoes. Good on grass clippings in the summer, and dry leaves in the fall. We have two now, and couldn't be happier. The first one we bought is as good today as the day we bought it! Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before and after many years it has broken down. I replaced it. It's my fault, but this is much smaller than my first one. My door is 35" but it is 30" and looks funny in its placement. It's not centered in front of the door but off to the side because it needs to be there to take off the dirt as people walk in. If you have a small RV or non-standard door, this will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. I have two incredibly furry dogs and most mats just don't work for us because we cannot keep them clean. This mat is great, their fur does not stick to it at all. You can also vacuum this. The backing is nice and not slippery, the mat stays in place. I would buy this again. It is holding up well and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.  Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that does exactly what it says. Very deep -cut "astro-turf". It appears very well made and rugged. I use it for my camper to to eliminate tracking into camper. It does clean very easily. One thing you'll need to remember. This mat can hold a lot of water if you using it outside. So be careful when you pick it up to clean or move. Great price, great product. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: David C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for high traffic areas
customer_reviews.text: Every other mat hasn't been able to stand up to a high traffic area like this one does. And the beauty of it is that it never looks dirty and I can just shake it out and put it back in place
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Marie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I need a rug to get grass clippings off my shoes to prevent them being tracked in my home. I tried numerous others. This cleaned my shoes better than any I tried. I saw some reviews that stated their rugs only lasted a year. I would gladly pay this small amount of money yearly to keep from getting scolded by my wife!
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cleaning snow off of boots
customer_reviews.text: I got this just in time for midwestern winter, and the mat has performed perfectly. Well, almost perfectly as the mat's profile is tall enough that it doesn't fit under my door's sweep. It is functioning just fine sitting off to the side of the door though. I'd rather it perform its function perfectly than have someone try to thin it out and make the mat less useful.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: This is the best front doormat out there if you can find one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best front door mat out there and it comes in colors! If you spill something or step in it this is the one you wish you had because you can take it to the car wash, like kitchen mats or hose it off yourself. I’ve been a General Contractor for well over 50 years and my offices automatically put one of these in front of every home or apartment we built, every home we remodeled or bought to fix up and resell
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Durable outdoor matt
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use for an outdoor matt before going into the shop. I was a little doubtful with the durability of the matt. After several months of use, NO DOUBTS here! It has held up very well and does a great job getting the dirt off the shoes and boots. It's very easy to clean, just rinse off with a garden hose. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FlygirlKS

customer_reviews.title: Good color and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new outside mat for our motorhome and I was sick of the green ones with the white plastic flower like we'd had before. The color is great and so is the quality. Very thick and sturdy. I expect this will last a lot longer than the previous ones we purchased at local stores.
customer_reviews.author: OpenTrackRacer

customer_reviews.title: Great valued door mat, traps dust very well
customer_reviews.text: I use this dust mat at the doorway of my basement woodworking shop. When I leave, I run my shoes against it to collect any dust and prevent it from getting upstairs. I've noticed a huge difference in the amount of dust on the stairs and in the living room since I've started using this. It was cheap, it's large, and a great valued mat for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SirFrankoman

customer_reviews.title: Solid mat
customer_reviews.text: We put two in our garage, one of which is on bare concrete. I'm happy to report that it does not slide around, which was one of my concerns. Maybe these are not the most exquisite things ever but then again they don't generate coir fibers everywhere and appear to be doing their job.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Does not hurt my dogs paws
customer_reviews.text: Does not hurt my dogs paws. My dog in sensitive paws and I was concerned that he wouldn’t walk on it. It does not seem to mind it at all. We have a lot of Pineneedles that make their way into our house. This has decreased significantly. I now have them at every entry point to the house. It was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tym

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic proven wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was highly skeptical about this mat however I was very wrong. This mat has been a lifesaver! I have 2 dogs (one being a golden retriever with furry feet) and this has almost eliminated any dirt that is brought in by them. I plan on buying some for my front porch now for those pesky human visitors lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Stays in Place
customer_reviews.text: Really like that this mat has a stiff backing so it doesn't wrinkle or bunch up when you wipe your feet. So far, so good in our windy part of the world. It stays put and its there when we need to wipe our feet. What more could I ask from a mat?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, catches lots of debris.
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these at our old place and bought two for our new one - this is excellent at catching debris (we have a lot of pine needles) and the materials it's made of make it much less likely to mold/rot/discolor like a traditional doormat. And it's super easy to clean with our garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor Mats EVER!
customer_reviews.text: With my Chiweenie I have gone through numerous floor mats at my doors. He just LOVES to rub, scratch and sleep on them. They never last and get ugly quickly. I decided to use these now at my doors. He still does his little dance on them, but they are still in great shape, easy to hose off and do the job of collecting crap off shoes as people walk in through my doors!
customer_reviews.author: dsrice

customer_reviews.title: Works like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect. Exactly what I wanted. It was exactly as described and if you want something to get the dirt off your shoes, and just hose it down after, this is for you. We are using it at our back door, so I bought it for efficiency, not decor. It is practical, inexpensive and it looks very nice. It fits perfectly in the area. Completely satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Suhajda

customer_reviews.title: Traps Dirt!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this doormat! I have 4 dogs coming through a dog door often and this mat traps SO MUCH dirt that I just can't believe!
customer_reviews.author: dobiegirls

customer_reviews.title: So nice, grabbed a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs is older and confused. He wanders in the dog run without watching what he might be stepping in. Bought one of these mats to put inside the doggie door and liked it so much, ordered another to go outside. Nothing tracked in since these were put in place. Shipping was very fast, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: wb

customer_reviews.title: Solid door mats made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Solid mats. Hold up to costant brushing and stepping on. Easy to clean, and solid price. I bought three and they handle the preemptive cleaning at each of my doors. Floors staying noticeably cleaner. Bottom line: Does the job for the right price. Also, made in the USA, so your money goes back into the domestic economy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Not pretty, that's for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This little mat. Elongated in a garage or basement. It is truly rough to walk on! I wanted something for INSIDE my front door. This looks like an industrial mat. Do not buy this for inside of your home. It's for outside! Do not step on it barefoot or with socks on. It is rough. I threw it out in the garage by the door. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: lon S. Bannett

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart :-(
customer_reviews.text: When cleaning snow off our porch, we picked up the mat and gave a little kick to it to get the snow out and the mat shattered into 3 pieces, probably because of the cold weather. Disappointed that we have to replace it less than 6 months after purchase. Wish it were more durable.
customer_reviews.author: lisaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick pile that actually traps the debris
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gravel terrain and traps it before you walk inside. Doesn't allow for your shoes to pick debris back up if you walk over it again because the pile is so thick. Easily shakes-out clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brewskii

customer_reviews.title: This is a great doormat. We use it at our seasonal campsite ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doormat. We use it at our seasonal campsite at the front door to our camper. Our site is grass and there is a sandy beach at the campground. This doormat traps dirt and cleans shows with ease. It holds a lot of dirt. It really makes a big difference inside the camper. The amount of dirt that gets tracked in is significantly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Doesn't stay together as well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my messy dogs. We have an almost all dirt front yard at the moment so you can imagine how fusterating letting the dogs in from going outside might be. They stepped on it and used the mat pretty well, until they decided that the taste of the mat was super delicious. Needless it say it's very easy for this mat to break apart. But it does hold quiet a bit of dirt for the prize and size you get.
customer_reviews.author: Math

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Nice scrubby mat really gets my shoes clean. A better color than the bright green ones and when you turn it over all the dirt just falls out so it's easy to clean. A big enough size to do the job easily. Slides a bit on my slick concrete but not enough to bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kelberlau

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good doormat to have outside the door. It cleans shoes effectively and just rinses off. Mine is mostly in the shade so I don't know how the sun would affect it. Cold weather doesn't bother it but just be careful if it is frozen because it could tear. It love it.
customer_reviews.author: Collector

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor mat, basic and functional
customer_reviews.text: We bought two to replace ones that had torn after years of use in the sun. These mats are easy to clean, just shake to loosen leaves and dirt. They blend in nicely with natural ground colors. Simple solutions are best.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a month, it is amazing! Normally when it rains our dogs track mud into the house and we have to mop constantly. With this, their feet are totally dry when they walk in! I'm planning on ordering another one for the front door.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Must Buy Product (especially if you have carpet)
customer_reviews.text: This product is no joke. We've been having A LOT of rain lately and it's been soooo muddy outside. With the carpeting in our home, it was a pain to keep cleaning all the gunk off from coming indoors. This mat helped us sooo much with our problem! It's so good at scraping off all the dirt and mud off of our shoes, so we could go inside and not have to worry about tracking it everywhere! Awesome product, and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sillygirl

customer_reviews.title: It's not really good for soaking up rain or moisture from wet grass ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use in the kitchen at my sliding glass door. Very functional. Catches a lot of debris from the yard. In my opinion it's more of an outside rug. It's not really good for soaking up rain or moisture from wet grass which is what I want so kids and animals don't step from the rug on to the carpeted area of my great room which is within inches of the vinyl flooring at the door.
customer_reviews.author: college mom

customer_reviews.title: this is the only kind of door mat that will scrape mud and leaves out of deep tread shoes and they're easily cleaned with a hose
customer_reviews.text: Formerly known as AstroTurf, this is the only kind of door mat that will scrape mud and leaves out of deep tread shoes and they're easily cleaned with a hose. Not found at Lowes or Home Depot. The readily available sisal fiber mats just don't do the job
customer_reviews.author: David H. Pascoe

customer_reviews.title: Works great to keep my RV clean
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine outside my door. My 4 stars for durability is because I had to replace the Mat after 1 year as the bottom started cracking. I ordered a 2nd one as I like it so much. Maybe I can get 2 years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning the boots. Stiff enough to get the dirt off but doesn't hurt if you step on it barefooted. Perfect for my use of coming into the garage. Looks like it should be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Holds more dirt then imagined!
customer_reviews.text: 3 boys who are outside all day long and become walking dirt piles which in turn get all over the wood floors. This mat surprisingly hold a ton of dirt!! When I finally get around to shaking it out I'm impressed how much dirt flies out.
customer_reviews.author: onecutepugdickey

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Using this in a "system" with the "Super Absorbs Mud Doormat...." with this being the first item and then the doormat on the other side of the door. Both are protected from the elements, and seem to be doing a great job despite some pretty heavy rain (and mud) in the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sweere

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION!
customer_reviews.text: This doormat is EXACTLY what I had been searching for! I previously had a "woven" doormat with a rubber backing that was difficult to clean (and dry after rainy weather) and neighborhood cats like to use it as a "scratching" mat before they turned it into an outdoor toilet! THIS mat gets dirt off bottoms and sides of shoes well... then just a quick shake and the mat is CLEAN! Bonus... the taupe color matches the brick exterior of my apartment and is therefore unobtrusive while still providing a needed function in keeping me from tracking dirt, grass and leaves inside! If it EVER wears out I will definitely invest in this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Jick T.

customer_reviews.title: Well priced for functional/attractive doormat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the charcoal colored doormat. Shipment arrived in 2 days. Its a good size for my front door and handsome color while still being functional at the same time. Perfect for snowy days and wet muddy days and it works as it has stated!
customer_reviews.author: R.Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Keep the dirt outside
customer_reviews.text: This is a really ugly plastic rug, but it works better than any other rug I've owned at removing dirt and debris from the bottom of my shoes. I use one for campsite and one at my back door and they're very effective at minimizing inside clean-up. Easy to shake out and hose down.
customer_reviews.author: La Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Best dirt trapper ever!
customer_reviews.text: There is no better mat for catching and trapping dirt. I have used one of these at all my doors, including the one from the garage to the kitchen for years. Every couple months, I take it outside and turn it upside down on the ground and hit the back, I'm always amazed at the amount of dirt it is catching.
customer_reviews.author: Charmvb1

customer_reviews.title: This mat does a good job...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mat in place for several months on our new deck just in front of the entry door. Still looks like new and really does the job in helping to keep debris and dirt outside.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Backyards with DG
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we installed decomposed granite in our backyard and we didn't want people tracking it back into the house and scratching our wood floors. So far, it works great at getting the particles off of shoes and we haven't had any issues. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: attractive
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks great by my front door. It's rubber but does not look like it. I hope it lasts and doesn't rot like all the other mats I've bought over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mats for your door
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mat i have had out of this material. The other one lasted years but did not move it to new house. These do a good job of scraping dirt and mud off of shoes and are easy to clean by shaking them out and occasionally rinsing with the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Hbb1967

customer_reviews.title: Recommend - Works as Outlined
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Bought this for our entrance to our camper to keep dirt out. It has a tough exterior and traps sand as stated. We still had a bunch of sand in our trailer but I think it's people not wiping their feet. I will most likely purchase 1-2 more to use at home and at the 2nd entrance of our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough...
customer_reviews.text: I bought thus used at a deep discount and have no complaints except that there is no way to remove the label on the back of the rug without damaging the rug itself.
customer_reviews.author: rhodekill

customer_reviews.title: Better than their Daisy mats.
customer_reviews.text: This mat has held up to the Florida sun and heat when their flower Daisy mats don't. These are thicker and haven't curled on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: JimM

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than stated
customer_reviews.text: The mat that I received is about 2.5" smaller than what was described. I know not a big difference but it does make a difference by my back door. I have purchased this mat before from HSN or QVC and this one was the smaller mat in their line up.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F.

customer_reviews.title: These Doormats Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. We already had four of them and decided we needed two more. They are durable, sturdy, so easy to clean, and they retain their astroturf grassy texture. They are keepers.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for a year.
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough, but after a year, the underside (the thing that keeps it together) has a split about a foot long. I don't think it's going to make it another year. For the price, that's expected, but I'll be looking for a more durable one whenever this one needs replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Clint R Florka

customer_reviews.title: Great lil mat, catches everything.
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping it holds up in the Florida sun as here in Florida the sun damages everything, time will tell. It looks nice, love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Keep dirt out of your RV
customer_reviews.text: This is like a non-powered vacuum. The fibers are long and keep your feet off of the dirt in the bottom that gets collected by the mat. The fibers are also tough and sturdy. Perfect for an RV or even a door mat for your home. I've turned it over to clean it out and couldn't believe how much sand and dirt was coming out. This is a must for RV's, which is where mine is located.
customer_reviews.author: E. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This mat is at my front door in Florida where sand sticks to your shoes. The pile is perfect for getting that invisible sand off my shoes before I come in the house. It is easy to shake out or wash off with the hose then it is ready to work again
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. It does what it's suppose to. Only downsides are that it feels extremely plastic, and up close it's honestly quiet ugly, but if you don't want to track in mud and leaves, etc, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Trishields

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Warm weather use only, item broke in pieces in cold weather while shaking off snow, poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.author: David Hiltabidle

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought several months ago for our entryway to our farm house. Catches a lot of dirt and crap. Sits in the sun half the day and still going strong and not folding down or fading. Great product. Will buy again when replacement time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this doormat. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Watched video describing this doormat and realized it was one I needed as at this point, my yard around Newhouse is sand and I need a mat to collect sand before it gets into house. This works great and all I need to do to clean is use hose on it. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mats
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats. Our two dogs track sand and dirt into the house. We bought several of the mats to line the entry hall. Nearly all the sand and dirt comes off their paws and into the mats which are very easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Coogan

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but completely non-absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Based upon previous glowing reviews, we were confident this doormat would help keep our entryway clean of leaves and other grime. We were devastated when this wasn't the case. Our entryway could have won the Guinness world-record for biggest collection of leaves and grime ever in an entryway. Unfortunately, we had to drink some Guinness in order to get ourselves motivated to clean the entryway just a few days later. The astroturf looks very cool, and the photo is color-accurate. HOWEVER, it absorbs no water whatsoever, which is what we wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Nebuchadnezzar

customer_reviews.title: Really a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this Matt. I put it in the entrance going into my back hall from the garage. One swipe of your shoes and almost all the crap on you shoes boots comes off. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Petr

product_meta.title: GrassWorx Clean Machine High Traffic Doormat, 18" x 30", Desert Taupe (10371857)
product_meta.description: Color:Desert Taupe| Style:Old ModelHomeowners want doormats that scrape shoes clean, while looking good and lasting for years. Our #1 selling doormat holds up to 2 pounds of dirt - keeping your home and hardwood floors beautiful. Clean Machine scraper doormats are perfect for high-traffic doors in your home. Manufactured by GrassWorx, Clean Machine door mats are exclusively made with Genuine AstroTurf scraper blades from edge to edge which have been keeping homes clean for over 50 years. This High Traffic doormat, 18" x 30", in Desert Taupe utilizes the scientific cleaning breakthrough mimicking the natural cleaning power of grass. These genuine AstroTurf scraper doormats are made from flexible, yet durable polyethylene. The patented manufacturing process creates a grid pattern of thousands of small plastic blades that provide an unparalleled cleaning surface that scrapes shoes clean... cleaner, in fact, than any other doormat.
feature_bullets: Clean Machine scraper doormat with triple cleaning action - grabs, holds and hides up to one pound of dirt per week
Made in the USA with genuine AstroTurf scraper blades to stop dirt at your door, and works better than any other doormat to keep your home clean
Great for front entrance doors, garage doors, back doors, patios, and decks; Durable hardworking doormat resists mold and mildew and the color will not fade
Works in all weather conditions – removing snow, mud, sand, grass, leaves, and dirt from shoes and boots
Easy to clean: shake out dirt and rinse with garden hose

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,004 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
